content.description: The diagram below shows a circuit composed of three logic gates. Each gate takes two inputs and produces a single output.
content.question: For which of the following input values will the circuit have an output of true ?

choices.label: A = true,  B = true,  C = true,  D = false
A = true,  B = false, C = false, D = true
A = false, B = true,  C = true,  D = true
A = false, B = false, C = true,  D = true

content.answer: A = false, B = true,  C = true,  D = true

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
